Description: Two Bedroom Apartment near Nubian Square. The unit features hardwood floors throughout, large windows allowing in tons of natural light, high ceilings, updated kitchen with granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances. The building features 2 laundry rooms, as well as controlled access via buzzer/intercom system. Parking is on-street but does not require a permit. One parking spot available for rent. Available SEPTEMBER 1!
